results.title: Tor Schwanck: gold and silversmith
results.creator_credit: Terry McMahon, Nina Syme and Victorian Film Corporation
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Craft as a Livelihood”
Metal-work has been in Tor Schwanck’s family since the 15th century. He is an artisan trained in all aspects of metal-work. Schwanck uses non-precious metals as well as gold and silver. All the designs are originals, and he tours, exhibits and receives commissions for his work.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Terry McMahon, Nina Syme and Victorian Film Corporation

results.title: Special Project no. 14: Marlo-Mallacoota-Cape Conran
results.brief_description: The Country Roads Board’s Project no. 14 involves the building of a road from Orbost to Marlo. Shows the first section to Cape Conran and difficulties encountered in clearing and leveling the sandy loam. The area opened by the road has great development potential in its attractive surf beaches, bushland and off-shore oil drilling. Photography by Jim Stirling.

results.title: Stories from the Jewish Community
results.creator_credit: Adriana Gomberg, Idit Benjamin, Alain Herz, Adam Barolsky, Adam Nudelman, Emma Levy, Sheiny New, Jenni Klempfner, Ximena Silberman, Astrid Silberman, ACMI and ACMI Digital Storytelling
results.brief_description:
An ACMI digital storytelling workshop creating stories through and about the Australian, Jewish community in partnership with The Jewish Museum of Australia.
These ten personal stories tell of the reasons for emigrating to Australia, whether it be for love or for a better life. These stories are woven with the excitement of new beginnings, the heartache of separation and the challenges of fitting respected traditions in with the new culture.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Adriana Gomberg, Idit Benjamin, Alain Herz, Adam Barolsky, Adam Nudelman, Emma Levy, Sheiny New, Jenni Klempfner, Ximena Silberman, Astrid Silberman, ACMI and ACMI Digital Storytelling

results.title: Small town girl
results.creator_credit: Emma Levy, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Emma Levy leaves the confines of small town life in New Zealand for Melbourne in the hope of connecting with a bigger Jewish community. This Digital Storytelling project was created in partnership with the Jewish Museum of Australia.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Emma Levy, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: The Shoemaker
results.creator_credit: Adam Nudelman, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Artist Adam Nudelman asks himself why he always paints shoes? Behind these objects lies a story about family and loss and brings him closer to his Jewish heritage. This Digital Storytelling project was created in partnership with the Jewish Museum of Australia
results.creator_credit_for_label: Adam Nudelman, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: Second life
results.creator_credit: Ximena Silberman, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Ximena migrated to Australia in 2003. To migrate is to be born again. While enjoying her new life in Australia, she looks back at the friendships and life she left behind in Buenos Aires. This Digital Storytelling project was created in partnership with the Jewish Museum of Australia

results.title: One wedding and several migrations
results.creator_credit: Adriana Gomberg, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: The dream of happiness is timeless and universal. Adriana Gomberg looks fondly back at her wedding day and recalls the reasons why her and her husband left Brazil to migrate to Australia. This Digital Storytelling project was created in partnership with the Jewish Museum of Australia.

results.title: My beautiful shwesters
results.creator_credit: Adam Barolsky, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Adam Barolsky laments the distance he has put between himself and his sisters to find a better life. He tells a tale of deep sorrow and concern for the welfare of the family he has left behind. This Digital Storytelling project was created in partnership with the Jewish Museum of Australia.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Adam Barolsky, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: Journeys
results.creator_credit: Sheiny New, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Sheiny New first came to Australia from America on a special scholarship program. While here she met her future husband and never looked back. She has since become a passionate campaigner speaking out against domestic violence in the Jewish community. This Digital Storytelling project was created in partnership with the Jewish Museum of Australia.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Sheiny New, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: Ingredients of love
results.creator_credit: Jenni Klempfner, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Jenni Klempfner explores her ancestors’ Polish and Jewish heritage as well as her own multi-cultural family. This Digital Storytelling project was created in partnership with the Jewish Museum of Australia.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Jenni Klempfner, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.description: Jenni Klempfner explores her ancestors’ Polish and Jewish heritage as well as her own multi-cultural family. This Digital Storytelling project was created in partnership with the Jewish Museum of Australia.
